sentences.en: Morning exercise reading is really an annoying unpopular Procrustean bed to all our students.
sentences.cn: 晨练和晨读对我们学生来说的确是令人讨厌的“一刀切”的做法.

sentences.en: The martinet governed his classroom with procrustean discipline, assigning a week's detention to all offenders, no matter what the offense.
sentences.cn: 纪律严肃的人用强求一致的训导支配他的教室，分配一个星期内拘留所有的罪犯，无论如何进攻。

sentences.en: This phrasal implied meaning in accordance with the Chinese language procrustean method similar is demand/ the not reasonable request handles affairs according to same standard.
sentences.cn: 这个成语的寓意和汉语削足适履一样是强求一致/不合理的要求按照同一标准办事。

sentences.en: Those strict proprieties of the old days are now regarded as a Procrustean bed.
sentences.cn: 那些老规矩现在被认为是普洛克路斯特斯之床.

words.tran_cn: 强求一致的；迫使就范的；残暴的
